sentence: As 40% of AP teams are considering AI adoption ([2025 Accounts Payable Automation Trends Report: Key Takeaways | SAP Concur](https://www.concur.com/blog/article/2025-accounts-payable-automation-trends-report-key-takeaways#:~:text=While%20automation%20has%20made%20strides%2C,AI%20technologies%20for%20spend%20management)), we aim to be early adopters by embedding intelligent insights into workflows.
